channel.title: Understanding Extra Lessons
channel.copyright: © Solid Gold Studios - all rights reserved
channel.media:copyright: © Solid Gold Studios - all rights reserved
channel.itunes:subtitle: Understanding Extra Lessons, whether your child really needs them, and how to choos the right tutor.
channel.itunes:summary:
If the words 'Extra Lessons' have recently surfaced in your family, it's likely you're experiencing some stress and confusion and are looking for some sensible, solid, sound advice.
Stay calm! We're here to help.
This series is aimed specifically at answering the most Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) we encounter and will help you make the right choices for your child.
If you have any questions we've missed, please drop an email to extralessons@solidgoldstudios.co.za

description.p:
If the words 'Extra Lessons' have recently surfaced in your family, it's likely you're experiencing some stress and confusion and are looking for some sensible, solid, sound advice.
Stay calm! We're here to help.
This series is aimed specifically at answering the most Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) we encounter and will help you make the right choices for your child.
If you have any questions we've missed, please drop an email to extralessons@solidgoldstudios.co.za

item.author: extralessons@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Extra Lessons | Solid Gold Studios)
item.itunes:author: Kip McGrath | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: 1 | Where to begin? | Stay Calm, we've got this
item.itunes:title: 1 | Where to begin? | Stay Calm, we've got this
item.itunes:subtitle: If you never thought the words 'Extra Lessons' would be part of your world, we're here to help. Let's start with the 5 stages of coping, a reminder that there are no 'miracle cures', and an introduction to our two specialist guests. We'll also talk about baseline assessments.
item.description:
If you never thought the words 'Extra Lessons' would be part of your world, we're here to help. Let's start with the 5 stages of coping, a reminder that there are no 'miracle cures', and an introduction to our two specialist guests. We'll also talk about baseline assessments. Stay calm! We've got this!

In this welcome episode you'll meet Paul Albrecht and Vishani Lukman who will share their extensive knowlede and expertise in the field of Extra Lessons with you.

If you're not already following us on Facebook, please like us now

You can also visit our website KipLessons.co.za to locate your closest Extra Lessons centre.

Presented by Melanie Walker, Edited by Shannon Kennedy, Produced by Vishani Lukman, Paul Albrecht, and Gavin Kennedy

Join the conversation and #BeHeard

item.itunes:author: Kip McGrath | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: 2 | How do I choose a Tutor? | Free Assessment
item.itunes:title: 2 | How do I choose a Tutor? | Free Assessment
item.itunes:subtitle: There is so much new information, how do I make the right choices? How do I get an assessment? What does it cost?
item.description:
In this episode we'll find out much more detail about how different Extra Lesson centres work, how many children are in a class, free assessments, how they work, how they individualise their programs, and what makes a centre the right fit for your family.

If you're not already following us on Facebook, please like us now

You can also visit our website KipLessons.co.za to locate your closest Extra Lessons centre.

Presented by Melanie Walker, Edited by Shannon Kennedy, Produced by Vishani Lukman, Paul Albrecht, and Gavin Kennedy

Join the conversation and #BeHeard

item.itunes:author: Kip McGrath | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: 3 | Focus on the Individual | Building Confidence
item.itunes:title: 3 | Focus on the Individual | Building Confidence
item.itunes:subtitle: What is the difference that makes the difference?
item.description:
How do I know if my child really needs extra lessons? How is this different from ordinary school lessons? How long do we need to go for extra lessons? What's the difference between remedial and enrichment? Let the experts do what they're trained for.

If you're not already following us on Facebook, please like us now

You can also visit our website KipLessons.co.za to locate your closest Extra Lessons centre.

Presented by Melanie Walker, Edited by Shannon Kennedy, Produced by Vishani Lukman, Paul Albrecht, and Gavin Kennedy

Join the conversation and #BeHeard
